title: The Heir of the Dragon Emperor and his Bride Corps - Novel Updates
genre: Action   Adventure   Ecchi   Fantasy   Harem   Mystery   Romance   Supernatural
tags: Beastkin   Beautiful Female Lead   Cheats   Chuunibyou   Conditional Power   Contracts   Demi-Humans   Dense Protagonist   Devoted Love Interests   Discrimination   Dragons   Eye Powers   Fantasy World   Game Elements   Goddesses   Godly Powers   Gods   Hidden Abilities   Human-Nonhuman Relationship   Inheritance   Kingdom Building   Magic   Magic Beasts   Magic Formations   Magical Space   Male Protagonist   Master-Servant Relationship   Naive Protagonist   Overpowered Protagonist   Polygamy   Protagonist Strong from the Start   R-15   Race Change   Royalty   Sealed Power   Siblings Not Related by Blood   Slow Romance   Special Abilities   Strong Love Interests   Transmigration   Transported to Another World
author: Sengetsu Sakaki   千月さかき
description:
Kiryu Shouma, an employee of Arasa Company, resigned from his job. He was thinking where he should go next, but found himself in a different world after walking out the company doors.

It was a world with monsters rampaging around, yet the goddess who summoned him didn’t gave him a single skill. In fact, he already has the power and skill needed to overwhelm the people that summoned him. That is because during his “Chūnibyou Phase”, he obtained a skill called “The Overlord of Variant”. He wasn’t able to use it in his former world but can in this wold.

Thus, by using the power he obtained, the journey to build a country in the new world has begun.>
